page.head: Statistics
page.body: Chronic dental infection is the most common progressive chronic problem in children under age 6. It is 5 times more common than asthma! In Alberta, 28% of 2-5 year olds suffer from cavities. An estimated 23% of children do not receive any treatment and are left to suffer. That’s 1.2 million children in USA and Canada who are left in constant pain.

page.head: Statistics
page.body: Dental surgery accounts for the majority of children’s hospital surgeries. In Alberta 13 thousand children have dental surgery per year! The cost for operation rooms in hospitals runs to $6.25 million per year for dental surgeries, and this number does not include dental care or other professional fees! That’s over $6.25 million of fully preventable surgery!
